titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the School of Forestry and Environmental Studies, Yale University, Records Concerning Research Projects and Grants Conducted by Faculty
School of Forestry and Environmental Studies, Yale University, Records Concerning Research Projects and Grants Conducted by Faculty
titlestmt.author: compiled by Daniel Hartwig

publicationstmt.publisher: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on Thursday January 10, 2019 at 11:21

did.unittitle: School of Forestry and Environmental Studies, Yale University, records concerning research projects and grants conducted by faculty

repository.corpname: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

did.abstract: The records consist of proposals, reports, correspondence, financial records, contracts, and related materials concerning research conducted by the faculty of the Yale School of Forestry and Environmental Studies (called the School of Forestry prior to 1972).

origination.label: creator
origination.corpname: Yale University. School of Forestry and Environmental Studies

odd.head: General note
odd.p: Forms part of Yale Record Group 20-D (YRG 20-D), Records of committees of the Yale School of Art.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: The records were transferred from the School of Forestry and Environmental Studies, 1982.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: The materials are open for research.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: School of Forestry and Environmental Studies, Yale University, Records Concerning Research Projects and Grants Conducted by Faculty (RU 39). Manuscripts and Archives, Yale University Library.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The records are arranged by granting agency or project title.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The records consist of proposals, reports, correspondence, financial records, contracts, and related materials concerning research conducted by the faculty of the Yale School of Forestry and Environmental Studies (called the School of Forestry prior to 1972).

controlaccess.subject: Forests and forestry -- Research
Human ecology -- Study and teaching

accessrestrict.p: The materials are open for research.
